creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: looping, contrasting lines of calligraphy; vertical format; tan paper; organic forms of trees in gold and grey
text:
The waka, entitled “Longing from Afar,” reads:
Should I ask or not ask, 
would it be useful like 
stirrups from Musashi' 
I have thought for a long time 
but I am still at a loss…
title: Longing from Afar
